task: A survey was conducted using a sample of high school teachers selected at random from California State Universities. The surveyed individuals were asked about a specific topic related to their field. What is the largest population to which the results of the survey can be generalized?

answers.A: All high school teachers at California State Universities
answers.B: All high school teachers in the United States
answers.C: All professors at California State Universities
answers.D: All professors in the United States

explanation: The results of a survey can only be generalized to the population from which the sample was selected. Since the sample was drawn from high school teachers at California State Universities, the largest population to which the results can be generalized is All high school teachers at California State Universities. The other answer choices are too broad and do not correctly represent the limits of the sample population.
category: Evaluating Statistical Claims: Observational Studies and Experiments
